title: Documentary
creator_credit: Herman J. Engel, Sonya Friedman and Texture Films
brief_description: A compilation film of major sequences from famous documentaries. Each sequence offers an important example of documentary style, content and construction. A brief introduction prior to each segment provides a historical context. This film is also available for loan in 3 parts: 1922-1939 (506297), 1935-1955 (506298), 1948-1976 (506299).
